title: 7 Minigames For Pvp Practice
briefDescription: Channel:ChannelThis map focuses on improvising many aspects of PvP, including, aim (For both the bow & sword), cps, inventory efficiency, & the ability to change slots ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Channel:
Channel
This map focuses on improvising many aspects of PvP, including, aim (For both the bow & sword), cps, inventory efficiency, & the ability to change slots quickly & accurately.
This can be seen through 7 Minigames
? Cps counter
? Aim practice for sword
? Aim practice for bow
? 1 Player Pvp practice (mob duel with options)
? 2 Player Pvp practice (1v1 Arena)
? Practice looting chests as fast as possible
? Practice switching items in Hotbar as fast as possible
This will help improve yourself in countless Minigames like: Skywars, BedWars, Duels etc?
? This will close to accurately count your cps. What you will do is click the button to the right & then a stick will appear in the item frame in the middle. Click the stick as fast as possible

? Aim practice, a silverfish will randomly spawn on this wall & once you kill it it will randomly find a different place on this wall. The more you practice killing the silverfish, the more accurate in aim you will become

? The minecarts will travel in 2 speeds, ?Sprinting? & ?staggered? movement. You also have an option to be in a minecarts itself. This sikulates aiming the bow at a moving target, while moving yourself.
? For this, you can fight 8 different mobs with 11 different setting options, which totals 48 different combinations for the settings.

? First picture: All the different kits
? Second picture: Put items you want into the chest, & then press the button, giving you a custom kit
? Third picture: The 1v1 Arena
? This minigame will help you loot chests as fast as possible by giving a randomized chest to practice looting.

title: Equinor Building, Fornebu / Norway
briefDescription: Equinor is a Norwegian oil company owned by the Norwegian government. This building is one of Equinors offices. Though its not their main headquarters, which ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Equinor is a Norwegian oil company owned by the Norwegian government. This building is one of Equinors offices. Though its not their main headquarters, which is located in Stavanger. This is located on Fornebu, B?rum county (in Norway).
The Equinor building on Fornebu was designed by A-Lab architects, a Norwegian architecture firm. The building is built up by 5 main segments which are stacked up on each other. In the middle it forms the atrium/lobby with a smooth bending glass roof.
This building took me around 2 days to build and complete. It took a few tries until I managed to get it right. It include the front entrance with the road, the entrance to the subway system (not included), the outdoor cafeteria area, the public art sculpture and and outdoor plaza.
The main lobby is also built within the building, there you can also find the cafeteria seating and the modern design of the interior. Examples of these are the funky purple coaches. In the center is the main elevators and staircase to get up the different levels.

title: 7 Overpowered Swords (No Mods, No Add-On)
briefDescription: Welcome to 7 Overpowered Swords, basically this is working with 100% Command BlocksThis is having Web Sword, Lightning Sword, Spin Sword, Ice Sword, Fire Sword, TNT Sword ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to 7 Overpowered Swords, basically this is working with 100% Command Blocks
This is having Web Sword, Lightning Sword, Spin Sword, Ice Sword, Fire Sword, TNT Sword and the WITHER Sword
#7 OP Swords
First is the ?Web Sword? ? That can trap/slow the enemy in the cobweb a useful sword right?
But it is not working in to the players : (

Second is the ?Lightning Sword? ? That can summon/struck a mob by lightning bolt what a super op sword, but becareful don?t use this in to the Pigs, Villager, Or Creeper or otherwise they?ll will transform into a Zombified Piglin, Witch, And Charged Creeper so becareful

Third is the ?Spin Sword? ? That can teleport the mobs near to you but, they?ll is spinning so you can easily kill them all little bit useful right?, but NOT the all mobs in the world is will teleporting near to you, only that in radius 10 that will teleport near to you

Fourth is the ?Ice Sword? ? That can trap/freeze the all mobs in the ice in radius 10 only but it is not working in players, this is useful when you at a bad situation (theres a horde of creepers) just use this and then boom they all gonna trap in the ice lol
Fifth is the ?Fire Sword? ? That can trap a any mobs (execept for flying mobs) in a pit of a fire, however when you use this in a big slime he will not trap because he is so big
Sixth is the ?TNT Sword? ? That can summon tnt and blow up the mobs near you but becareful if that sword is start to summon just run far away or else the tnt is gonna hurt you so becareful

And the last one is the ?WITHER Sword? ? That can give any mobs near to you an wither effect 5 with 60 seconds, the mobs will no escape in this sword they?ll DIE, however this is not working in the players only for mobs, the boss like a ender dragon and wither is immune in this effect so they will not affect with this effect

Complete these 7 levels and kill the ender dragon to win. In this world, you have to pass 7 different levels and you can do it with endless friends. It doesn?t need any mod.Good luck!!!!
In this world, you have to pass different levels to complete it!
We recommend to play with 5 players, but if you want you can do it with more!
You don?t need any mod!
In this find level, you have to find a button, but to find it you have some parkour
At this level, you have to pass all the lava because there are invisible blocks in there.
See the roof!

This labyrinth has a mob that chases you to the end. Run!!!
This level is a choose the right door. There aren?t any questions, just your luck

A complex Redstone mechanism is going to push you to the lava. But if you are fast you can pass and complete it
This is the last and more difficult level. First, you have to collect all the resources while you fight with monsters. When you are ready, in the corner of the level there is a button to transport you to the Ender Dragon, so collect all and prepare yourself
The Ender Dragon is waiting for you, so beware, he is very powerful

title: Flat Land and Small Mountains
briefDescription: This is a really flat plains type biome surrounded on one side by mountains and birch forest on the other. If you go to the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a really flat plains type biome surrounded on one side by mountains and birch forest on the other. If you go to the other side of the mountain there is a nice beach area. Other than the main flat land and the surrounding area, there has been no other editing.
I created this world as a flat land for building! I then thought of the reasons I liked the area and thought other people would also like to build in the area.
Change: The river next to the flat area (partially visible in the first image), has been widened and deepened due to suggestion in the comments.

title: Villager?s Town
briefDescription: From a simple village into a detailed town, Villagers Town has everything you need for survival and it is not just a village, it is ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
From a simple village into a detailed town, Villagers Town has everything you need for survival and it is not just a village, it is a town. Just explore and see the beauty of the town.
What?s inside of the Villagers Town?
Villagers Town has everything you need for survival. There has fishing area, farming area, crafting area, smelting area, repairing area and so much more. In this town, you can see the hospital, church, bank, bakery, school, camping area and more. You can live in the hobbit holes and some houses that you have started to survive.
How many months did you build this town?
I took 3 months to build this town. So, explore it and see all of my hardworks.
What can I do in this world?
You have so many to do in that world. You can start your own survival and take so many adventures, even you can play hide and seek by just putting something. And then, play PvP with your friends. So, there has lot of stuffs to do in this world. So, thanks for downloading and have enjoyed.

title: DoggoHax | Vanilla Minecraft Hacks
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted a placeable End City Chest with loot? What about a Sharpness -32767 Diamond Sword? Or maybe you wanted to spawn a ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wanted a placeable End City Chest with loot? What about a Sharpness -32767 Diamond Sword? Or maybe you wanted to spawn a player in Vanilla Minecraft. And if players aren?t your style, why not spawn a Game Crash? All of this and more is possible with DoggoHax.
The DoggoHax world does NOT include any addons. The only packs added are ?Always Show Nametags? and ?Better Font?. This makes it a very incredible experience!
Experimental Gameplay and Education Features are turned ON for the world. This is probably necessary, but I am not 100% sure. (Just keep them on, because it may break things if they?re not.)
The world is a superflat. The hacked items are all contained in a single Ender Chest. The chest contains 3 each of 9 different Shulker Boxes. They are shown below. (all except the last SECRET one!)

My personal favorite Shulker Box is the ?Secret Eggs?. The others are also very cool! Everything should be pretty self-explanatory. There?s even a treasure hunt at the end!
Some other pictures of the map:

title: The Floor Is Lava V1 (Parkour)
briefDescription: In this awesome minecraft parkour map, you have to parkour among various differnt obsticales and levels, but dont fall into the lava! There are 6 levels, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In this awesome minecraft parkour map, you have to parkour among various differnt obsticales and levels, but dont fall into the lava! There are 6 levels, all with their own checkpoints.
This parkour map features a house you have to escape, two buildings to parkour across and one to parkour in, and a street with 3 cars! Once you?re on the top of the building there is parkour in the sky that brings you all the way up to a helicopter!

title: Bamboo Parkour
briefDescription: The Parkour that you are going to download is BAMBOO PARKOUR.Parkour that I made is very challenging with 7 levels of difficulty. Starting from the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Parkour that you are going to download is BAMBOO PARKOUR.
Parkour that I made is very challenging with 7 levels of difficulty. Starting from the very easy parkour to the most difficult one available in this parkour.
Parkour is not only easy but it will boost your skills in playing Minecraft Parkour, especially for those of you who have tried various kinds of parkour.
